Verses: 1 isravel Veettaare, Karththar Ungalukku Sollugira Vasanaththaik Kelungal:
2 purajaadhigaludaiya Maarkkaththaik Katrukkollaadhirungal; Vaanaththin Adaiyaalangalaale Purajaadhigal Kalangugiraargale Endru Solli, Neengal Avaigalaale Kalangaadhirungal.
3 janangalin Vazhipaadugal Veenaayirukkiradhu; Kaattil Oru Maraththai Vettugiraargal; Adhu Thachchan Kaiyaadugira Vaachchiyaal Panippadum.
4 velliyinaalum Ponninaalum Adhai Alangariththu, Adhu Asaiyaadhapadikku Adhai Aanigalaalum Suththigalaalum Urudhiyaakkugiraargal.

5 avaigal Panaiyaippola Nettaiyaai Nirkiradhu, Avaigal Pesamaattaadhavaigal, Avaigal Nadakkamaattaadhadhinaal Sumakkappadavendum; Avaigalukku Bayappadavendaam; Avaigal Theemaiseyyakkoodaadhu, Nanmaiseyyavum Avaigalukku Sakthi Illaiyendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
6 karththaave, Umakku Oppaanavanillai; Neere Periyavar; Umadhu Naamame Vallamaiyil Periyadhu.
7 jaadhigalin Raajaave, Umakku Bayappadaadhiruppavan Yaar? Dhevareerukke Bayappadavendiyadhu; Jaadhigaludaiya Ellaa Gnaanigalilum, Avargaludaiya Ellaa Raajyaththilum Umakku Oppaanavan Illai.
8 avargal Yaavarum Mirugagunamum Madhiyeenamumullavargal; Andhak Kattai Maayaiyaana Podhagamaayirukkiradhu.

9 thagadaakkappatta Velli Tharsheesilum, Pon Ooppaasilumirundhu Konduvarappattu, Avaigal Thozhilaaliyinaalum, Thattaanin Kaigalinaalum Seyyappadugiradhu; Ilaneelamum, Raththaambaramum Avaigalin Udumaanam; Avaigalellaam Thozhilaaligalin Kaivelaiyaayirukkiradhu.
10 karththaro Meyyaana Dheyvam; Avar Jeevanulla Dhevan, Niththiya Raajaa; Avarudaiya Kobaththinaal Boomi Adhirum; Avarudaiya Ukkiraththai Jaadhigal Sagikkamaattaargal.
11 vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Undaakkaadha Dheyvangal, Boomiyilum Indha Vaanaththinkeezhum Iraadhapadikku Azhindhupogum Enbadhai Avargalukku Sollungal.
12 avare Boomiyaith Thammudaiya Vallamaiyinaal Undaakki, Poochchakkaraththaith Thammudaiya Gnaanaththinaal Padaiththu, Vaanaththaith Thammudaiya Arivinaal Viriththaar.

13 avar Saththamidugaiyil Vaanaththile Thiralaana Thanneer Undaagiradhu; Avar Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharaththilirundhu Megangalai Ezhumbappanni, Mazhaiyudane Minnalgalai Undaakki, Kaatraith Thamadhu Pandagasaalaigalilirundhu Purappadappannugiraar.
14 manushar Anaivarum Arivillaamal Mirugagunamullavargalaanaargal; Thattaar Anaivarum Vaarppiththa Suroobangalaale Vetkippogiraargal; Avargal Vaarppiththa Vikkiragam Poiye, Avaigalil Aavi Illai.
15 avaigal Maayaiyum, Magaa Eththaana Kiriyaiyumaayirukkiradhu; Avaigal Visaarikkappadum Naalile Azhiyum.
16 yaakkobin Pangaayirukkiravar Avaigalaippol Alla, Avar Sarvaththaiyum Uruvaakkinavar; Isravel Avarudaiya Sudhandharamaana Koththiram; Senaigalin Karththar Enbadhu Avarudaiya Naamam.
17 aranil Kudiyirukkiravale, Dhesaththilirundhu Un Porulgalai Serththukkol.
18 idho, Naan Indha Murai Dhesaththin Kudigalaik Kavankonderindhu, Avargal Kandu Unarumpadi Avargalukku Nerukkamundaakkuven Endru Karththarsollugiraar.
19 aiyo! Naan Norukkappatten; En Kaayam Kodidhaayirukkiradhu; Aanaalum Idhu Naan Sagikkavendiya En Noi Endru Naan Solluven.

20 en Koodaaram Azhindhupoyitru, En Kayirugalellaam Aruppundupoyina; En Pillaigal Ennaivittup Poivittaargal; Avargalil Oruvanumillai; Ini En Koodaaraththai Viriththu, En Thiraigalaith Thookkikkattuvaarillai.
21 meyppargal Mirugagunamullavargalaagi, Karththaraith Thedaamarponaargal; Aagaiyaal, Avargal Kaariyam Vaaikkaamarpoi, Avargal Mandhaiyellaam Sidharadikkappattadhu.
22 idho, Yoodhaavin Pattanangalaip Paazhum Valusarppangalin Dhaavumaakkippodum Seydhiyin Saththamum, Vadadhesaththilirundhu Periya Kondhalippum Varugiradhu.
23 karththaave, Manushanudaiya Vazhi Avanaale Aagiradhallavendrum, Than Nadaigalai Nadaththuvadhu Nadakkiravanaale Aagiradhallavendrum Ariven.
24 karththaave, Ennai Dhandiyum; Aanaalum Naan Avamaaip Pogaadhapadikku Ummudaiya Kobaththinaale Alla, Mattaai Dhandiyum.

25 ummai Ariyaadha Jaadhigalinmelum, Umadhu Naamaththaith Thozhudhukollaadha Vamsangalinmelum, Ummudaiya Ukkiraththai Ootrividum; Avargal Yaakkobaip Patchiththu, Avanai Vizhungi, Avanai Nirmoolamaakki, Avan Vaasasthalaththaip Paazhaakkinaargale.
